data.text: Bethany makheiya araming Lazarus inti miring inkhat ana-ah aleiom, Bethany hi Mary li Martha ngai unai omna khuo kha eii. Luk 10:38,39
Hiwa Mary hi eii, Pumi keiiya sariak rimkahoi bunna asamma akeii kaleinuulpi nukha, akanapa Lazarus hi anaipa kha eii. Jn 12:3; Luk 7:38; Mk 14:3
Khawa jarra a-unu ngai'n Jisu diang chong inleipeii, “Pumi, nang iminriang pakha anajei.”
Jisu'n chongkha aleijet phakhan, ma'n aleiti, “Hiwa akanahi akathi sik emak; Pathian lurna heichoinasik eii, halli hiwa hi'n Pathian Sapa kha lurna amusik eii.”
Jisu'n Martha li anainu khat-um Lazarus kha aleiminriang.
Ama'n Lazarus kha anajei iti chongkha aleijet phakhan, Ama'n aleiomna munkhan nini alaleiom.
Halli hiwa thengnga ama'n asiamruoi ngaidiang aleiti, “Judea-ah woikhat siritrui.”
Asiamruoi ngai'n amadiang inleiti, “Rabbi, Jihudi ngai'n nangkha apha matiang lungnga nadeengnasik inna-entok, halli nang in khawa khan woikhat nalasiritsibe?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Suun khat-ah phadan soomleini emak abe? suunna chuonkatho mi khan insuinuni, ajarchu ama'n hiwa manmasituol war kha amu.
Takkha tu ka-ang inkhat in zaanna chuon atho inchu, ama'n insui, ajarchu war kha amadiang ommak.”
Jisu'n hiwa itile inruoiya inmani diang aleiti, “Nisuopui Lazarus kha azaaljei, takkha kei ama kakeithei kasisik eii.”
Asiamruoi ngai'n amadiang inleiti, “Pumi, ama'n azaaljei inchu damjeite.”
Jisu inchu Lazarus kathi jarra aril, takkha inmani inchu azaalla soong imachum jarra inlei-ngaidon.
Khawa jarra Jisu'n inmani diang inthiangnga aleirilpi, “Lazarus athijei;
Nangni ngamnasik jarra kei'n khawa munkhan kileiommak kha karatha arok. Eini'n amadiang situi.”
Didymus Thomas in asappui siamruoi ngaidiang aleiti, “Amale juothi suomnasik eini rakip um situi.”
Jisu'n aheitung phakhan, Lazarus kha thaanna inreiina nimili huuijei tikha aleijet.
Bethany hi Jerusalem makheiya miles innidaam inlaak,
halli Jihudi katamtak-um innaipa thipi jarra Mary li Martha kamatheemtai sik-ah inheiwa.
Martha in Jisu kha aheiwajei ti aleijet phakhan, ama'n aheisuok-ah Jisu kha alei-inmupui, takkha Mary chu innsuungnga aleiom.
Martha in Jisu diang aleiti, “Pumi, nang in hin naleiomngai suok-inchu, kanaipa hi leithinuni!
Takkha kei'n kajet khachu tuunnum nang in Pathian diang na-ini rakip kha Pathian in nangdiang napesik eii.”
Jisu'n Martha diang aleiti, “Nanaipa aringnook sik eii.”
Martha in aleimasang, “Ahekna nikhuoni khan ama kha hongringritte tikha kei'n kajet.”
Jisu'n Martha diang aleiti, “Kei hongkaringnook khat-um ringna kha ka eii; Kei kadiang ka-ngamna miring khan inleithi innum inhongring sik eii,
halli karingnga kei kadiang ka-ngamna miring khan angtikseng thinunijei. Nang hiwahi na-ngamnabo?”
Ama'n Jisu diang aleiti, “Oh, Pumi; Kei'n nanghi Messiah, Pathian Sapa manmasituolla akajuo kha na-eii tia ka-ngamna.”
Hiwahi atisuoli Martha in asiya anainu Mary diang ruuk-ah ajuoti, “Karu kha hin omjei halli ama'n nangkha anakoi.”
Hiwa chonghi ajet phakhan, Mary in innottheiya intheiya Jisu inmupui sik-ah aleisi.
Jisu kha khuosuung laheiluutmak, takkha Martha in intongpuina munkhan alaleiom.
Innsuungnga kaom Mary kamatheemtai Jihudi ngai'n Mary in innottheiya intheiya tuol isuok inmu phakhan, inmani'n Mary kha thaanna akachapsik isirit ejei inngaidonna anukkha inleijui.
Mary in Jisu omnakhan aheitungnga ama'n Jisu kha amuli amumak ama kekuungnga inbok-ah aleiti, “Pumi, nang in hin naleiomngai suok-inchu kanaipa hi leithinuni!”
Jisu'n Mary khat-um Mary le kaheiwasuom Jihudi ngai'n inchap kha aleimu phakhan, amalungnga kahoimak khat-um poongna aleinei.
Jisu'n aleirakel, “Ama kha hun ningreiime?”
Jisu'n aleichap.
Jihudi ngai'n inleiti, “Enru ama'n angtuk iminriangme!”
Takkha miring lekkhat ngai'n inleiti, “Amit kacho kaminmu hiwa mipa hi'n Lazarus thimaknasik thomatormak niabe?”
Inlet-ah malung kahoimak in asip-ah, Jisu'n thaanna aleisi, thaankha lungkarong khurra alei-eii, khat-um thaankha lungnga inleikhar.
Jisu'n aleiti, “Lung kha khairu!”
Jisu'n Martha diang aleiti, “Na-ngamna inchu Pathian lurna lianna kha namusik eii natimongbe?”
Khawa jarra Inmani'n lungkha inleikhai. Halli Jisu'n chungtiang enna aleiti, “Kapa Kei'n nangkha kanaminpaak, ajarchu nang in keidiang nanara-ngaipi.
Nang in amunle apha rakip-ah keidiang nanazootpi itihi kei'n kajet, keihi nang inajuotir eii tia hinna kaom inmani ngai'n ngamna inneinasik kei'n inmani sik-ah nangdiang kanahongni.”
Ama'n hiwahi atisuoli, “Lazarus, heisuokro” tia rasa inringnga aleikoi.
Lazarus khan akeii akut khat-um ameel ngaikha kathi puonna intuomma aheisuok. Jisu'n inmanidiang aleiti, “Suutpi inlang ama kha minsiru.”
Mary le akaheiwa Jihudi mi katamtak ngai'n Jisu itho inmu phakhan, inmani'n amadiang inlei-ngamnajei.
Takkha miring lekkhat chu Pharisee ngaidiang inkirra Jisu itho ngaikha inmani diang injuorilpi.
Khawa jarra Thiampu kalian khat-um Pharisee ngai'n uparup ngaikha inkhoomchunna inleiti, “Angkeme eini'n nithosik? ajarchu hiwa miringpa'n inlak chuon tamthei athojei!
Eini'n hin niminthotit inchu, mi rakip in amadiang ngamna inneisik ejei, halli Rome chuonkaroon ngai'n hong-inta eini inthiang Biak-inn khat-um niphung nizaat hi-um innakasutsik ejei!”
Takkha inmani ngai karra, Caiaphas, khawa kumma Thiampu Kaliankhet ka-eii, ama'n inmani diang aleiti, “Nangni iteii jetmakchu!
Phungli zaat rakip kamangsik neek-ah mipui sik-ah miring inkhat akathisik hi athawiai itihi nangni'n jetmak chube?”
Hiwahi ama'n apumtak ranak-ah iti emak; takkha khawa kumma Thiampu Kaliankhet ejarra Jisu hi Jihudi phungli zaat sik-ah athisik eii tia ama'n ileirilsuok kha eii,
inmani sikbit emak, takkha inchekchaiya kaom Pathian mi ngaikha inkhat bit-ah aheikeichun nasik eii.
Khawa nikhuoni makheiya ranak kanei Jihudi ngai'n ama thatnasik-ah minsuukna inleinei.
Khawa jarra Jisu'n Jihudi ngai karra inlarra leisimakjei, takkha khawa ramkha amathaanna neelram koolla kaom Ephraim inti khuokhan aleisi, halli khawakhan ama'n asiamruoi ngaikhale aleiom.
Jihudi ngai Rakaanna Kahoi aheitungnasik aphakha aleinai, halli mipui katamtak in ram ram makheiya kahoi madet inmani sinadan dungjuiya inthiangnasik Jerusalemma inleisi.
Inmani'n Jisu kha inlei-entok, halli Biak-inna inngirra inkhatli inkhat in, “Ama kha kahoiya ahongsikbe, hongnunibe, nangleii ang na-ngaidonme?” tia inlei-inbiak.
Thiampu kalian ngai khat-um Pharisee ngai'n Jisu omna kajet mi rakip in inmani diang ningnamindiksik eii, halli inmani'n Jisu kha kinsursik eii tia chongkha inleipejei.
